analyzed: bhagavati bahu rūpe nirvikāre nirañje
nimita nikhila rūpe niścaya atīta rūpe
akhila nigama pāre nitya nitya svabhāve
caraṇa kamala yugmam naumi devi tvadīyam
hasita mukha śaśāṅkam jyotsnayā rātri bhūtam
daśa śatakiraṇa udyat vaktra mādhyandinam te
aruṇa vadana śobhā audayī ca asta kāle
caraṇa kamala yugmam naumi devi tvadīyam
gala jaṭhara padeṣu svarga martya ahi lokāḥ
sakala bhagaṇa dantā romarājī drumāḥ te
girayaḥ iva nitambāḥ rakta śuklāḥ samudrā
naumi devi tvadīyam
pavana dahana vegāḥ śvāsa praśvāse eva
pralaya prabhava kālaḥ mīlana unmīlanābhyām
dvidaśa tapana bhūtā bhīma vaktrāḥ tvadīyā
naumi devi tvadīyam
anupama tanu deham vyāpyamānam samantā
darśayan devi divyam
tribhuvanam akhilam te darśitum eti
naumi devi tvadīyam
vidhi mukha vibudhāḥ te kiṃkarāḥ pāda saṃsthā
mukuṭa vidhṛta buddhe sarva mārgāḥ hi śuddhe
kimu tava mahimānam varṇaye guhya devi
caraṇa kamala yugmam naumi devi tvadīyam
anupaṭhati samāptau pūjane bhaktimān yaḥ
nutimati spaṣṭam eva asya buddhiḥ
sakala jana jananyā bhakti sampattim uccais
kara tala vaśa gāḥ tāḥ siddhi puṣṭayau labhante  /
śrī svayaṃbhū purāṇa uddhṛtam mañjunātha kṛtam
guhyeśvarī stotram samāptam
